item.title: Berlin Blitz: Conquer the Capital in 48 Hours
item.description: Discover Florence in 3 days with this art and food lover's guide. Immerse in Renaissance art at the Uffizi and Accademia, indulge in Tuscan cuisine at local markets, and explore iconic landmarks. Perfect for couples seeking a blend of culture, history, and gastronomy in Italy's heart.
